website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting a smaller dog house for teacup-sized pups should check out this beautiful wooden option.
pros: Option to purchase in extra-small, small, medium, and large
Lightweight design allows product to be moved both indoors and out
cons: Many customers complained of a chemical odor upon the product's arrival

website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for buyers needing an affordable wooden dog house for their smaller pups.
pros: Available in small, medium, and large sizes
Customers appreciate the product's easy assembly
Includes a raised floor with durable feet

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever For Us!
customer_reviews.text: Took exactly 23 minutes to assemble with assistance with my wife. That includes removing from the box. Lay everything out first is the key. Holes lined up perfectly. Used a drill to screw roof on with lowest setting. Easy Peasy. Great product. I may get a smaller one for my cat! Directions are good enough so don't listen to others. Sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Flying Spaghetti Monster

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product for your puppies.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good dog house. 1. There are cracks right out of the box. 2. Very light weight, puppies can easily chow then up. 3. Smell very very bad. My dog would not want to stay in there even with treats. 4. no predrilled holes for roof. 5. Bad craftmanship, the roof is not able to be screw in. It has not been rain yet, but once it rains, I belive the water can easily leak in. Overall, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it but some chipping!
customer_reviews.text: Love the dog house and my dog Nala does too! It took me about 10mins to assemble. The reason why I gave this product a 4 star instead of a 5 is because there is chipping on the house already (see pics and video). All of the holes for the scews where pre made. Some of them weren't made in the right area which caused the screws to chip the wood of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The advertised size for the Large Dog house is incorrect by 10 inches regarding the depth. Depth is only 36 inches NOT 46 inches as indicated. Other than that it's a great dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: The wind and rain will cut right through it without a tarp over the top in the winter. I live in Sacramento, CA where winter isn't all that severe and I wouldn't want my dog to have to sit through a rainy day in it. My dog was reluctant to use it but i haven't tried other dog houses to see if he just doesn't like dog houses in general. At. $99.99 at time of purchase and a year later at the time of this writing, i'd say try to find it cheaper if you can.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Just don't walk around with it stuck to your nose!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Perfect size for my chihuahua (7 pounds). The cedar smell isn't that bad. It doesn't take over the room or anything. I only smell it when I put my nose up near the wood. So if you don't like the smell of cedar, then I wouldn't suggest walking around with the dog house over your head! Lol Smells like a clean hamster cage to me! The color is a bit off from the picture shown. It's more of a light pinky red. Nothing that can't be changed though. Overall, I'm glad I got it for my fur baby. It's going to stay inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Champlin

customer_reviews.title: For San Diego weather I think it will be ok but would not recommend it for any other non-warm climate or bad weather ...
customer_reviews.text: just built mine... I cant rate this product high for the following reasons 1) the roof panels are warped and difficult to install warped 2) the roof panels did not fit to the end and back panels so I had to re-cut them to make them fit 3) the shorted me 5 screws... For San Diego weather I think it will be ok but would not recommend it for any other non-warm climate or bad weather area as it will not last...
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Not just a dog house
customer_reviews.text: We bought this house for our turtle, Hank. My husband put a ramp on it plus carpet and dirt and she loves it. It took a little while for her to get the concept but once she did. The house protects her from the elements. It's sturdy and built strong. Nice find!! Nice look too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts don't align correctly
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, holes didn't match up due to poor pre-construction. I had to remove screws and re-align things that were done by the manufacturer... then, the roof slats are not built to fit the divots provided, so the roof is crooked. Not work disassembling and repackaging to return. I'll deal with the shoddy, crooked roof but it gets 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot vouch for this enough! I provide a lot of outdoor shelters on my property for cats, possums, raccoons, and anything else that comes by. I have purchased a lot more expensive items, but they are not better. I cut a hole in the back and added a warmer. I am ordering more to hide in the brush on the edges of my property. Love that it is a bit off the ground. The cats seemed attracted to it more so than some of the other options. I worried about the x-small for my purposes, but don't. It is more that sufficient for a cat. Quality construction and size!
customer_reviews.author: indira

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and perfect fit for a dog.
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is amazing. My dog loves it. She now has her own cabin at my cabin in the woods super easy to assemble. 8 bolts and 12 screws. Only needed a screwdriver since the bolts are Phillips head. Took like 20 min from opening the box to full assemble. My dog is a chi-weenie. I got her the small and threw a little bleacher seat cushion in there for her. I also threw a little light in there for her. It’s not that heavy either. So it’s easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: joshua mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, I posted 4 instead of 5 stars because it was too small for my shitzu-maltese mix, I guess it's my fault for not checking the measurements well enough but I didn't think my little dog would be too big for any kind of dog house
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, just not pretty
customer_reviews.text: it harbors mosquito inside. Also the treated wood stinks for a while because its fresh. the logo pipsqueek black ink was more of like splattered than nicely pressed in the wood. The color was off too, its a little darker and more saturated. Other than that it seems like a sturdy product. it's just -1 for smell and -1 for butchered logo mark.
customer_reviews.author: yume

customer_reviews.title: Nice home for my poodle.
customer_reviews.text: Nice dog house!! Purchased the medium for my 15lb poodle. The small would have been waaay to small for my dog. DO NOT over tighter the screws or you will crack the wood. Also, do not use power tools or you will most likely crack the wood as well. Recommend this to anyone with a dog that is not to rough and crashes into things. This house is kind of light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Thebarbrr

customer_reviews.title: Basic Dog House assembles easily
customer_reviews.text: Pre-fabricated house for a small to medium sized dog. Went together in just a few minutes. The doorway is open. No door. The wood is stained or painted, but porous. We have the dog house under our patio cover, so it is out of the elements. If this would be under the open sky, exposed to direct sun and rain, I recommend applying a couple of coats of clear polyurethane before assembly to protect the wood and make the house last longer.
customer_reviews.author: 805reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Decent shelter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to provide safety and shelter for an outdoor cat we've adopted. It came without assembly instructions, but went together pretty easily. Some of the pieces were chipped and had suffered in shipping, but it got here quickly. The wood is thin (approx 3/8" thick) and the somewhat flimsy construction is not going to hold up to a bear attack. Fortunately, we don't see many of those in my neighborhood. This will do what I bought it for, and for the price, I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: TweeDLX

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: this little house looks really nice but to be honest after assembling it i decided to reinforce it because it just felt real flimsy. was a breeze to setup it took me about 10mins to have the entire thing assembled though. i honestly dont expect it to last even a year but if it does i will be sure to post that it has.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: X-small house for cats, they love it
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy. Purchased the x-small for my cats to use out in their enclosure. I was very easy to put together. No words instructions, just look at the pics. Like others have stated it will need weathering maintenance. I'm going to buy 2 more. 1 for my little dogs, the other for cats. I wouldn't buy the larger one for a large dog, I can't see it holding up. The wood is very soft. I'm going to add a handle to easily move it around. Happy Cats 🐈
customer_reviews.author: Many Catz

customer_reviews.title: A good looking and relatively easy to assemble dog house
customer_reviews.text: A good looking and relatively easy to assemble dog house. Yet I live in the Seattle area and wanted them (purchased 2) to keep my dogs dry when it rains. The bottom is slated to breathe but this allows water to splash up into the dog house. Additionally, even with an added overhang I constructed and added above the door to help keep the water out, the water gets in and soaks the mats I purchased for the dogs comfort. All this with them placed in a particularly covered area. Would be great in dry weather...but....sort of useless, honestly...
customer_reviews.author: Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Seems OK
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well. Went together easily and is very nice looking for a dog box. I feel the wood it is made from is a bit on the light side. I think I'll keep an eye on it every year and see if I need to reapply any weather treatment to keep it from rotting. Time will tell. I'll come back in a year or two and report how it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: So Cute?
customer_reviews.text: My puppy likes it. It will help him stay warm when he's outside on chilly mornings. This Dog house is easy to assemble, well made and perfect for a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: fran j

customer_reviews.title: Great dog house
customer_reviews.text: Light but sturdy. Nice materials, easy to build. Has lasted quite a while now and has held up to the elements extremely well. Looks fairly new, even though it no longer is. Nice price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R

customer_reviews.title: Good for my Jack Russell Terrier
customer_reviews.text: My JRT loves her dog house. It was easy to assemble, is weatherproof, and sturdy. Even when it is dry, my pup likes to sleep in it. In the photos, she is 6 months old. There is plenty enough room for her to grow. My 31 pound, medium sized dog even fits in it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great product! A lot of negative reviews about the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! A lot of negative reviews about the assembly and the smell. Assembly was VERY easy, all parts were included. 4 bolts/nuts through front and back hold the sides on, the floor drops in from the top, then the roof panels are screwed on with 4 screws each side, finally the roof cap is screwed on with 4 more. Everything was included. 10 minutes tops. It did smell a bit strong at first, 2 days outside and the smell is gone. I purchased for outdoor cats to help them through winter. Just ordered 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: TheKingRooster

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: 8 months after purchase and this is warping and falling apart. Wood too thin to handle outdoor weather.
customer_reviews.author: W. Converse

customer_reviews.title: Smells! Color not like description!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look like the picture. I got a red little barn house. It is supposed to be a lighter wood. It also smells horrible! My cats smelled it and ran. The smell is so strong it makes my eyes water. Vortex should stain the wood with polyurethane to avoid the cedar smell. No I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: Fancy but functional...easy peasy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy as pie to assemble (took about 15 minutes) and is fabulous. It is our "cat house"...because of the easy assembly we were able to slip in the cord that attaches to the heating pad that warms the whole house, making it the perfect outdoor haven for our kitty! Quality product...looks great on our porch!...The added benefit?....Our cat loves it! (PS in the photo ...we hadn't yet put the roof on correctly...when finished it fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Marc's love

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, but can be with a little DIY project
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a stray, and it gets wet inside when it rains, so the stray doesn't find it useful. I am going to get some clear caulking-type sealant for between the wood on the roof, then when it dries, paint on some clear sealant on top of that. I'm not into diy, so I would have been happier buying something that was already waterproof. I should have read the description more carefully, because it does not say waterproof. I would like to let the stray join us in the people house, but my cat likes to terrorize him, so I will try to make the little house more accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later still working well
customer_reviews.text: I initially coated it lightly with waterproof wood spray, but the dog house was left outside for 3 years. Still looking and working great today!
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Medium doe NOT fit a small to medium dog! But...
customer_reviews.text: Medium does NOT fit a medium dog! But I love the way it looks I ordered two so I hope the large fits my medium dog trying to find an xtra large it really is that nice looking🐕
customer_reviews.author: Mary Shubert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2 Small Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this dog house for our two very-small dogs to share (a tiny toy poodle and a shitzu). It is perfect for our dogs, so I would say about 15 pounds is the maximum you would want to buy it for before moving up a size. EDIT: This dog house has a very strong cedar-like smell to it. It's not an unpleasant smell . . . just strong. I'm wondering if this might be why my dog, who has never destroyed anything before, chewed all the edges to pieces the first day we had it. That was an EXPENSIVE chew toy. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Camping

customer_reviews.title: Less expectation but reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: House was not well made however given the price it was acceptable. It was fairly easy to put together until you get to the roof peak. The two roof panels at the peak didn't line up. It was definitely a design fraud or I just got the bad one. Same comment was made by the other buyer(s). I had to do some work to get it to work but not perfect. I would have returned it if I didn't have to put everything back in the box. I wouldn't be able to anyway given how they pack it. 2 stars for reasonable price for a reasonable product.
customer_reviews.author: hkfpe

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Good size
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. The wood doesn't look like it'll last for years (probably laminate of some sort) but it is sturdy. Easy to assemble - but be careful that the screws will chip off the nearby wood easily.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this house in May. I have 2 smallish dogs, a pug and an english bulldog. Together they weigh 60 lbs. After 1 month, the floor collapsed. I bought the largest size house so why did it not hold my two dogs who don't weigh a ridiculouws amount of weight like some animals? I think it should have lasted more than the 5 months I have had it, spring and summer and part of fall. I guess there is no hope for the winter. Very disappointed in the product. Looks nice but doesn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: donna provost

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog House. Clean & Well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: I bough this for our new pitbull mix puppy. Its deep enough for him to grow into, and the inside is high enough for him to have head room and it over all is a beautiful dog house. Easy assembly, nothing banged up.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Cedar Wood
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice well built cedar dog house. One of the black trims was frayed from packaging but I used a wood glue and some black magic marker to repair it. I purchased a large size and it fits my Aussie dog who is 54 pounds. Just make sure your dog can fit through a 15' wide opening, the inside floor is 32 " long.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Small but Cute
customer_reviews.text: Although, I ordered the next size up, the medium dog house is actually a small house with a hefty price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Came in with a few cracks in the wood. The top beam of the a frame can’t be screwed on all the way with the screws provided because the screws aren’t long enough
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Song

customer_reviews.title: Minor issue
customer_reviews.text: The dog house is nice .. some of the holes didn’t line up right. It was easily fixable
customer_reviews.author: Haley Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is ADORABLE! very cute and well made. Easy to put together. Only thing is the floor moves a little when our Lab steps on it. It is still good tho. Kudos to the designer , we wanted something that looked cute on our back porch and this fit the need. Perfect for our pooch. :)
customer_reviews.author: GirlAfterQuality

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog house
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Dog house on Aug 28 and received it on Aug 30. Easy to put together - and that was having my 7 yr old grandson do most of it. All the pieces were included and took about 15 min to assemble. Only catch was the floor needed to be trimmed to fit properly but that took 1 min with a saw. This little house fits our 12 lb Pomchi and our other 8 lb Pomchi. Even though it's quoted as X-Small, I would consider it a Small. Some reviews said the stain smell was strong but within an hour of putting this house together, it was gone. Glad we purchased this...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Howard

customer_reviews.title: My fur son Sniper is known as a Zuchon (shihtzu bichon mix), and I ordered x-small.
customer_reviews.text: Sniper’s an indoor dog, and this dog house was perfect size, smell, and fit! In total love and it doesn’t take up a lot of room. This house was pretty much self explanatory and extremely easy to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Toy W.

customer_reviews.title: Expected dissatisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time but, as other reviews stated, the wood was split. I could have very easily fixed the broken wood but if I spend nearly $200 on something like this then I expect it to be in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Velazquez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Walls and roof seemed pretty tight. NOT meant for extreme cold weather comfort ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little dog house-purchased as a gift for 2 Chihuahuas-will last indoors on in sheltered outdoor area for quite some time. We cut and added a separate piece of foam to the floor to cover the slight gaps in the construction-gaps are in the floor, not the walls. Walls and roof seemed pretty tight. NOT meant for extreme cold weather comfort as it's single-wall construction but it IS decent shelter for anything above 50 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats
customer_reviews.text: X-Small. I bought this as a shelter for my formerly inside cat that now insists on living on my front porch. It's attractive and does a good job of giving him extra shelter on cold nights. My porch is covered, so not a real test of how this house would hold up in rain. Cat seems to enjoy sleeping in it. It was easy to put together and because the floor comes out, it should be easy to clean. Note: When you receive this it will smell awful from the wood stain. Just let it sit outside for a few days and the odor will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Well.. I wish I had asked my dog...
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn't like the smell of it. So she hasn't used it ...But oh well. For the look and the space in it. Its her lost! :) Lololol
customer_reviews.author: Lady M

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: There's no way you could get this for the same price at a pet store. Its amazing. Perfect for our outdoor kitty.
customer_reviews.author: brittany morgan

customer_reviews.title: I should have sent it back
customer_reviews.text: While assembling I found I had to drill my own holes to put it together just took a little longer and part of the house was cracked disappointing
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Arrived with a broken off wood strip from a roof panel. I had to glue and screw it back on. Roof panels didn’t line up on top. I had to make several modifications to this dog house during assembly. I don’t think this will hold up long term to my 70 pound pit bull - is not sturdy at all and material is very thin. Best suited for small/light dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I wish I can give it less than one star... It came in a dirty box that looked like it has been opened and resealed multiple times. As soon as I opened the box- the smell (extremely pungent) overfilled the whole room. The color was definitely not what it seems in the photo! Extremely misleading picture. The finishing on the wood was terrible and there were multiple spots where there was strange looking moldy substance. I will be returning it today- Maybe it was just that I received a returned item- but whatever it was... it was not fit for any pet to live in.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. The Roof Ridge does not fit the ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The Roof Ridge does not fit the body of the dog house. There is about a 2" gap between them. I tried to exchange it, but the second one came just the same. Don't recommend to buy. Thanks for Amazon's easy return, I was able to get a speedy refund.
customer_reviews.author: My Handle

customer_reviews.title: bought this for the cat that my neighbor left behind ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the cat that my neighbor left behind when they moved. Yeah Rude right!!!! I feel sorry for him, he's an outside cat. I've been feeding him and he's been staying on this house, I take it he loves it lol
customer_reviews.author: JENA JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the strong oder when you open the box I cannot complain. Oder does go away!! My only suggestion is to pay close attention to the size you order if you have a small breed weighing ten pounds or less I would get the extra small house. These houses are very roomy. The first one I ordered was a medium because two if my dogs lay together in the littlest ones styrofoam house and needless to say we had to upgrade. The meduim house was damaged and I returned for the small and still could have gotten away with sending back for extra small. Very pleased with and also easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: tkfjohndeere

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautiful little house. My toy schnauzer loves it! I bought the small size because of the extra height. Assembly was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia barone

customer_reviews.title: It was fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: our outdoor cat loves it. It was fairly easy to assemble. giving 4 stars instead of 5 b/c several of the predrilled holes didnt match up- but easy enough to drill together anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Put your Dog in there
customer_reviews.text: I put my dog in this thing. He is a chihuahua. A medium sized chihuahua. Ever notice how weird of a word that is? Chihuahua. It keeps him warm and dry and smells of cedar. The dog’s name is TAZ by the way.
customer_reviews.author: JESSE HANOWELL

customer_reviews.title: it screwed onto the house with a hole on the back of the dog house the same size as the original doggie door worked perfect. Of
customer_reviews.text: This X-Small dog house was prefect because I needed one that could be attached to the doggie door that exits out of the house. With just a bit of altering, it screwed onto the house with a hole on the back of the dog house the same size as the original doggie door worked perfect. Of course the roof top had to be cut so it would be flush with the back of the dog house. It just looks like a dog house up against the side of the house. A Plus...helps keep the wind from flapping the doggie door flapper
customer_reviews.author: blessed

customer_reviews.title: Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Looks good and it easy to put together. I had seen some reviews about the wood splitting but if you use a handheld screwdriver and don't overtighten, you shouldnt have that issue. It took me about 15 mins to install. We are going to use this for our outdoor cat so I'm excited that it looks good and is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great dog house. My son assembled it in less than 30 min. Good size for my 30 lb dog. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Puuuurfect for our two cats
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our two outdoor cats to cozy up together. Easy to assemble. Kept them protected from the rain. Looks great on our deck. I would suggest purchasing a foam pad for the inside. Thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.Allison

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog house
customer_reviews.text: I got the x-small and it is really tiny. I got for my Yorkie and she fits in it but I think the next size would have been better with a little more room.
customer_reviews.author: Nueva York Soul

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is made from real cherry wood!! Such great quality for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Dog House
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive dog house. Easy to assemble. Great look for our front porch. My dog loves it! Before attaching the roof, I applied silicon sealer to all seams for a more draft free house. Also, I cut a thick shower curtain liner to size and attached to door opening from the inside for a see-thru wind flap. We bought two, one for each dog. The house needs to air out for a day. There was a very strong sealer/stain odor.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to put together and just the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to put together and just the right size. Like the small legs, don't have to worry about water flowing in. Only problem is that we have 2 small Havanese and they still do not use it. Will bring it in when it gets cooler, we know they will use it then.
customer_reviews.author: squicci

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great dog house! Our border collie/ beagle pup loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina B.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect dog house.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the extra small. Dimensions-Exterior: 22-1/four-inch Width by 22-inch Depth by 22-three/four-inch Top Inner: 17-inch Width by sixteen-inch Depth by 17-inch Top Door Opening: seven-three/four-inch Width by 10-1/four-inch Top. It's perfect for our miniature doxy. The instructions are image, no text, it was very easy to assemble. It can be assembled with one screwdriver. The pre-drilled holes all line up. Everything fit. It's a classy little house.
customer_reviews.author: Nehntek

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Great size. My dog has yet to use it- she is loving her freedom too much with the new fence. So she never stops long enough to try it out. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Dcloin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality easy assembly, NOT for total outside weather elements. GREAT for a sheltered area like a covered patio.
customer_reviews.author: BJM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and is just adorable. Next thing I have to manage is to get Diggy to go inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Pet Squeak Arf Frame Dog House, Small
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite satisfied with the dog house which turned out to be a great size. It was easy to put together and the price was right. Also, the Arf House arrived in very goo condition for it was well packed. I found the price to be quite reasonable too. The only con I found, was two of the screw holes in the roof or on the house itself, didn't align and I had to drill new holes. I still would recommend it to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie Brodsky

customer_reviews.title: Styrdy
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the house it’s a very nice dog house
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Still Great after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good looking dog house. We have had it for a year with no problems. Perfect for our mid sized Pomeranian. Granted, we live in Las Vegas, so the winters are not too crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Doghouse at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is awesome. Assembly is stupid simple. the cedar wood is so soft that the drill holes need not line up perfectly, although ours' were fine. You could not buy the supplies and put the time into building something comparable to this for this price. It's our dog's third doghouse and the only one he's actually liked using too. Pre fab doghouse perfection at a great price....no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog House- Medium Size
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, allow the wood to breathe once you unpack it. Very easy to assemble and looks great on our back patio. The internal sizing was off for me. From Amazon, I bought the "Midwest Quite Time Deluxe Gray Ombre Swirl" dog bed, 23"Lx18"Wx2.5"H and realized I could fit 2 of these in the medium sized house. So, I have 2 of them, positioned horizontal and they make a great place for our pup to lay.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: My pomeranian loves his new dog house. I went ahead and sealed it to further help protect it from sun damage. I had to it closer to the house to reduce rain from coming in the door.
customer_reviews.author: Rocko

customer_reviews.title: Handsome, Easy Assembly House
customer_reviews.text: Only nine pieces, and the pictures on the instruction sheet were spot on. Took all of fifteen minutes for assembly. All the pre-drilled holes lined up properly and it was just very simple to put it together. Packaging was real solid, and the wood pieces seem solid. Time will tell as to their longevity. The assembled dog house looks very nice and solid. Glad we decided to get this instead of the plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Round Rock Dad

customer_reviews.title: I loved this dog house
customer_reviews.text: I loved this dog house, except the holes for the roof do not line up. When you go to screw in the screws, they do not reach the dog house. They are off by about half an inch. Also some of the boards are warped.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.text: It smells very nice and it's made out of real wood. It was very easy to assemble and I was originally worried to buy it but since I saw many people saying good things about it I went for it. I love that we bought this and if I could buy it again I would. I am not a robot or fake reviewer. I have pictures to prove it. Trust me it's a good buy,nothing was broken and everything was pretty good quality. Didn't even take my boyfriend five minutes to build it too, super simple.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and looks great! Will be the perfect fall escape for our feral cats, but not suitable for Georgia summers. There is no ventilation and when the thermometer read 84 degrees outside, the cat house was reading 102... and it is in the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Worthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Fast delivery, easy set up took about 15 min. My boy loves his dog house !
customer_reviews.author: julz santi

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Doggie Lodge
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Easy to assemble. Smells like cedar! My dog took to it right away. Had it outside when we had a light shower. It was stayed dry inside. Will move to a covered deck for winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Pegs

customer_reviews.title: A great seller.
customer_reviews.text: I had a small issue with the house. I reached out to the seller and they were very quick to make it right for me. After, I assembled and it works perfectly for my little weiner dogs. Thank you for your great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog House
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is great! We got it for our cocker spaniel mix puppy. She is pretty small so it will give her room to grow into it. It was really easy to put together. It comes in panels, not individual slats. The instructions are not very helpful but it is pretty easy to figure out. There is a pretty good smell to it when it arrives but I think its just the fresh stain and will be fine once it is outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Momma@home

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Log Cabin Doggie Den. This is the XSmall. Easy to put together. I brushed Polyurethane all over it which added the finishing touch. I got a dining chair cushion to put inside and that fits perfectly. My little Yorkie and my little Chihuahua fit perfect inside together. I didn’t get this for outdoors, I wanted something that looked nice in the house.
customer_reviews.author: CPalen

customer_reviews.title: Poor wood quality
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute, easy to put together, and serves its purpose for our outside cat. However, the wood is soft and a few pieces came chipped and split; nothing a little wood glide didn't fix. I'm glad I have it for our cat but wish it was better quality wood. Now if I can just find a way to get the cat to use it :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: fast to put together about 20 min. 100% what ...
customer_reviews.text: fast to put together about 20 min. 100% what was looking for . we use it as a inside dog house for wife's 6 lb Yorkie
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. Easy to assemble. I was a bit put off by the smell that seemed to linger on the wood and some of the instructions on the Manuel they sent did not match up directly with the wood pieces but other than that we were very pleased with our dog house and our 8 year old Dachshund loves her new home!
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: House was easy to put together, beautiful and very Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Krimzen Rose Kreationz

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: A very nice sturdy doghouse. Was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: A satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roof is short! Does not extend out like shown in picture and description :(
customer_reviews.text: Item not as described. The roof that came with ours does NOT extend out in the front of the entrance door... We were looking forward to this feature to offer rain protection like it shows in the pictures and description here. I even counted the roof slats, in the picture there are 18, our roof only has 16. We already assembled and it's too much of a hassle to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Le

customer_reviews.title: I love this little pet house
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pet house! I bought it for my cats and I wanted something that was a little more pleasing to the eye for a rustic style home. This does not disappoint! I will buy the large for my 4 month old puppies once they get bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It went together easily as well
customer_reviews.text: We live on two acres and have many small pets. This was purchased for our harlequin rabbit to have a place to get out of the weather and hide. It has held up very well in our 115 summer Heat. It went together easily as well. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: nice little solid house
customer_reviews.text: Great little home for our outdoor kitty. The hubby put some insulation on the bottom and and we then put blankets over the top. WI winters are cold and this home seems to keep the snow/rain out so far. I am not too protective of the outdoor kitty but wanted somewhere for him to be, seems to prefer this house :) Water proof other than when the blankets hang out the door in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Breindl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality , easy to build, my Yorkie loves it. Fast shipping, and easy to put together. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: WigginsArmy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price. Except for the Chemical Smell.
customer_reviews.text: For the Price I paid it is totally worth it. You have to put it togerther but its really easy to do. The only Bad thing I can say is that The Stain or Clear coat that they used it really Strong. I had to wash out the entire House Twice with Hot Water and Soap to get rid of that Strong Chemical Smell. I have had it now for almost 7 months and the Chemical Smell is gone.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie tomas

customer_reviews.title: After a week one panel broke
customer_reviews.text: Too bad my dog really like it and I did too. Very easy to assemble but after a week a huge split on one of the wood panel appeared. Waiting for the manufacturer to see how they are going to fix this issue. Will keep you posted on their customer service. Update from last review. Great customer service after acknowledging the issue-panel broken- the manufacturer offered Us a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: nathalie fournet

customer_reviews.title: My pet duck loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little pet house that was really easy to assemble. The house is sturdy and perfect for my little pet duck who needs shelter from the hot sun in summer and major rains.
customer_reviews.author: MrsH

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my Yorkie that keeps everyone up at night
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my Yorkie that keeps everyone up at night. Put her in a kennel with this perfect size house with a pillow in it at night. Easy to put together, packaged well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: curly

customer_reviews.title: She loves it...
customer_reviews.text: Our outdoor cat seems to be enjoying this little house. I covered the top with a large clear trash bag to keep the rain out.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats or small dog breeds
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cat, and she seems to love it. It was easy to build, sturdy and good size. I wouldnt reccomend this size for any dog bigger then a chihuahua or tea cup breed. I have a Terrier mix rescue and will be ordering the "small" size for her.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

product_meta.title: Arf Frame Dog House with Dark Frame
product_meta.description:
Size:X-SmallThe Arf Frame Dog House is a Real Wood Home for your woofer. One of Pet Squeak's most popular Dog Houses, the Arf-Frame provides your pet their own comfortable habitat. The Arf Frame Dog House is a "Close Fitting" habitat for many breeds of dog who prefer a tighter den. If your dog requires more space, consider purchasing this house in the nebyt larger size. Please compare listed dimensions to the size of your pet. Ebytra Small House Dimensions-External: 22-1/4-inch Width by 22-inch Depth by 22-3/4-inch Height Internal: 17-inch Width by 16-inch Depth by 17-inch Height Door Opening: 7-3/4-inch Width by 10-1/4-inch Height. Overall External dimension is inclusive of the roof, which will have an overhang. Internal dimensions indicate the habitable space for your pet, and are inclusive of the size of the interior floor space. Pet Squeak Wood Dog Houses are designed to be Affordable, Durable, Easy to Assemble, and Comfortable for your pet. The Primary Wood in Pet Squeak Dog Houses is Cunninghamia Lanceolata, commonly referred to as "White Cedar" or "Stained Whitewood". This special wood is renowned for it's strong fresh aroma, pest resistance, and appearance. Most of our Wood Dog Houses ship right to your door via UPS or FedEby and require only the assembly of a few panels, normally taking only 20-45 minutes until your pet has their "Own Place". Choosing a Size Weight is the easiest factor in determining the appropriate dog house size, but factors such as breed traits and personality may also be factors. In general, dogs prefer domains that are slightly larger than their body and just large enough to lay down and turn around comfortably.

AMAZON.COM


PET SQUEAK ARF FRAME DOG HOUSE, S/M/L
A SIMPLE TO ASSEMBLE, AFFORDABLE HOME FOR YOUR PET
Pet Squeak Arf Frame Dog House with Dark TrimPet Squeak Arf Frame Dog House with Dark TrimPet Squeak Arf Frame Size LargeFor Your Pet Princess, also available in Pink (Arf Pink)Also Available in Natural Trim (Arf Natural)

Description

The Arf Frame Dog House is a Real Wood Home for your woofer. One of Pet Squeak's most popular Dog Houses, the Arf-Frame provides your pet their own comfortable habitat. The Arf Frame Dog House is a "Close Fitting" habitat for many breeds of dog who prefer a tighter den. If your dog requires more space, consider purchasing this house in the next larger size. Please compare listed dimensions to the size of your pet.

Pet Squeak Wood Dog Houses are designed to be Affordable, Durable, Easy to Assemble, and Comfortable for your pet. The Primary Wood in Pet Squeak Dog Houses is Cunninghamia Lanceolata, commonly referred to as "White Cedar" or "Stained Whitewood." This special wood is renowned for it's strong fresh aroma, pest resistance, and appearance. Most of our Wood Dog Houses ship right to your door via UPS or FedEx and require only the assembly of a few panels, normally taking only 20-45 minutes until your pet has their "Own Place."



Features: 


 *  Easy Assembly 
 * Fir Construction 
 * Lightweight and Durable 
 * Solid Wood 
 * Raised Floor 
 * Naturally Weather-Resistant 
 * Non Toxic 
 * Sheet lined inner-roof




Dimensions and Pet Sizes

Weight is the easiest factor in determining the appropriate dog house size, but factors such as breed traits and personality may also be factors. In general, dogs prefer domains that are slightly larger than their body and just large enough to lay down and turn around comfortably. 

Extra Small House Dimensions
 * External: 22.25W x 22D x 22.75H inches
 * Internal: 17W x 16D x 17H inches
 * Door Opening: 7.75W x 10.25H inches
 * Pets up to 15 Lbs
   


Small House Dimensions
 * External: 27.25W x 20.75D x 29H inches
 * Internal: 20W x 15.25D x 23H inches
 * Door Opening: 8.25W x 13H inches
 * Pets up to 30 Lbs
   


Medium House Dimensions


 * External: 33.25W x 27.5D x 32H inches
 * Internal: 24.5W x 20D x 26.5H inches
 * Door Opening: 9.75W x 15.25H inches
 * Pets up to 50 Lbs
   




Large House Dimensions


 * External: 32.25W x 46D x 36H inches
 * Door Opening: 11.75W x 18H inches
 * Pets up to 80 Lbs
   

Note: Overall external dimension is inclusive of the roof, which will have an overhang. Internal dimensions indicate the habitable space for your pet, and are inclusive of the size of the interior floor space.



Guarantee

We guarantee this product's workmanship and material quality for one year from the date of purchase, under normal conditions.
